ValidationRule.description: This is created as part of SCDEV-5393. It is to check oneApp Access and oneApp Start date both the fields has a values in it.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND ($Setup.LVGO_Automation_Switch__c.Validations__c, OR ( AND( OneApp_Access__c= TRUE, ISBLANK(OneApp_Migration_Date__c)),
AND( OneApp_Access__c = FALSE, NOT(ISBLANK(OneApp_Migration_Date__c)) ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If OneApp Access is checked you must enter a OneApp Start Date value. If you enter a OneApp Start Date value then you need to enable OneApp Access flag.
